description: The verification history of a treatment plan.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number that corresponds to each verification of the treatment plan in this row.

columns.name: PLAN_VER_DT_HX_TM
columns.description: The date/time in external format of a verification of the treatment plan in this row.

columns.name: PLAN_VERUSER_HX_ID
columns.description: The user ID of the person who performed a verification of the treatment plan in this row.
